channel.title: Several Questions
channel.description:
1 - I first log on to my server. I made myselft admin, but when I enter the game should appear a crown when I talk? 2 - How can I edit the public chat? Like it says "welcome to testscape. Owner is......." 3 - How can I edit the welcome screen?
Thanks alot for all your help!
